page.title: 10HOME LIFE:FENNY COMPTON.
page.content: {A DAY IN THE LIFE OF HELEN,AGED 7yrs.} On Monday,I woke up,had breakfast and caught the school bus. We had time for a game of 'tig' on the playground before the bell went. After the Register,we had Assembly with a story, a prayer and a hymn. This week, we are thinkingabout homes, and today it was Dr. Barnado. In History, we are studying early man. In Maths, we work from workcards. I'm on multiplication, and I like it. Our dinner is cooked in the school kitchen.It was beefburgers. In the dinnerbeak, I had a recorder lesson, and it was my turn to play on the computer.I played on tyhe climbing apparatus,too.In the aftrenoon, we built a model woolly mammoth. The School Bus came at 3.15 p.m.After watching some TV at home,we had tea.I played on my bike, but it was soon time for bed.
